memberdef.name: IMPL_DYABLO_EXPECT_THROW
memberdef.initializer: { \ if (!bool(cond)) \ { \ std::ostringstream ss; \ ss << "Dyablo expect failed at " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << std::endl; \ ss << "Function : " << __func__ << std::endl; \ ss << "Condition : `" #cond << "`" << std::endl; \ ss << "Message : " << message; \ throw std::runtime_error( ss.str() ); \ } \ }

sect2.title: End Private Implementation
sect2.para: Defines to enable/disable corresponding asserts The default behavior is defined here, but asserts can be forced on/off with -DDYABLO_ENABLE_ASSERT_*=0/1

detaileddescription.para: Enable/disable using [[assume]] or equivalent instead of assert when asser is disabled
